archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Galaxy
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Order management application: The Galaxy system acts as the main hub for the stock control system and holds master data for all products and address details for Branch, Royal Mail, Parcel Force and third parties. In relation to products, Galaxy stores approximately 11,000 products 30% of which are active at any given time.
Supported by Esteem and CSM. Interchange carry out deployment/configuration of the application
Galaxy is a bespoke application written in NCR Cobol on an NCR 3000 running Unix V
• Holds a large variety of master data about items, delivery sites and supplier contracts • Keeps track of stock available • Takes in orders from POL branches and other warehouse client sites • Reserves stock, if available • Consolidates orders per delivery address and Passes orders to WCS for picking, packing and dispatch • Case management for customer queries • Provides POLSAP with data so that clients can be billed.
Galaxy receives orders from branches, as well as Royal Mail and Parcel Force depots, and fulfils them by interfacing with WCS and Mercia; note that it has both POL and RMG users.
Galaxy acts as a hub, with WCS, Mercia, Royal Mail and Parcel Force systems as spokes. A number of Access databases are used in conjunction with Galaxy, assisting in the management of master data, and the formatting of branch and client orders, all arriving from a variety of sources.
